channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.0-beta.9)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.0-beta.9)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.5.0-beta.9 - 2023-09-12 # Fixed # Automatic MergeBone doesn’t think about animating m_IsActive of GameObject #454 MergeBone may make some bone inactive to active if bone being merged is inactive #454 1.5.0-beta.8 - 2023-09-11 # Fixed # MergeBone will break Normal and Tangent #448 PhysBone for Animator Parameter disappears #452 RemoveMeshByBlendShape on the SkinnedMeshRenderer with MergeSkinnedMesh not working #451 1.
